### Police Incident Data: 2003 - 2018

```{r}
old_police_files  <- list.files(pattern = 'Police_Data_....\\.csv')

old_police_tables <- lapply(old_police_files, read.csv, header = TRUE)

old_police_data <- do.call(rbind , old_police_tables)
```
